user_sentiment: Satisfied - empty next message with session end suggests the user approved the architectural planning work and had no further immediate requests.
execution_quality: High-quality execution with thorough exploration. The agent read relevant source files, created a comprehensive plan document detailing two architectures with tradeoffs, and successfully navigated plan mode approval with user clarification questions.
work_category: Architectural planning and design exploration for a merchant payment system integration. The agent entered plan mode to map out two competing architectural approaches for integrating UCPExecutor with PeachAdapter, creating a structured decision document with tradeoffs.
summary: The agent successfully moved a vague architectural discussion into concrete planning by entering plan mode, reading relevant code, creating two detailed architectural proposals with tradeoffs, and obtaining user approval. The work was well-scoped and focused on the user's stated goal of "implementing both for consideration and comparison." One minor alignment gap: the user mentioned the need for "more planning" on multiple options, but the agent delivered exactly two architectures rather than exploring a broader design space with multiple options per approach.
follow_up_pattern: User will likely review the plan document and either request implementation of one architecture, request modifications to the plan, or provide additional guidance on architectural decisions.
